errors.error: ⚠️ An error occured! Please, try again.
errors.invalid_token: ❌ Sorry, but you can't use this command due to an invalid/undefined twitch token. Please, use /login command.
errors.invalid_command: ❌ Sorry, but this command doesn't exist. Please, use /help command to see all available commands.
errors.invalid_query: ❌ It seems that you didn't provide a query for this command. Please, check the command usage with /help command.

start:
👋 Welcome! I'am your personal Twitch bot. I will notify you when your favorite streamers are live.

To import all your followed streamers, please use /import command, or use `/follow [nickname]` to follow a streamer.

Got questions about other commands? Use /help command.

login.login_link: 🚀 Please login with this link below! It will expire in 10 minutes.
login.logged_in: 🎉 You are now logged in! You can now use command with ⭐
login.already_logged_in: 👍 You are already logged in! If you wishing to logout, please use /logout command.

logout.are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to logout?

follow.already_follows: You already follow this streamer. use /unfollow to unfollow them
follow.dont_follow: You don't follow this streamer. use /follow to follow them
follow.unfollowed: You are no longer following this streamer

following.no_following: You are not following any streamers
following.followed_list:
*You are following %count% streamers*
📃 Browse followed streamers (*%cpage%/%tpages%*)

%list%
_Use `/unfollow [nickname]` to unfollow a streamer_
